title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects


Expected Behavior:
The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories.


Observed Behavior:
When exporting a zip file, if two files with the same name exist in different directories (e.g., foo.txt in project 1 and foo.txt in project 2), the export fails.

Steps to Reproduce: 

1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as "foo.txt")
3. From the main menu, select File > Export and choose Zip File to export
